Description:
A DEVELOPERS DREAM IN THE ‘TOORAK’ POCKET OF CROYDON
They don’t come much better than this for buyers looking for future redevelopment prospects.
Set on a substantial 1157m2 block in the highly sought after and adored Monastery area, this immaculate and original three-bedroom abode has stood the test of time and is now screaming for some enthusiastic buyers to give her new sparkle, build your new dream home or for property redevelopers to consider the almost completely flat site to make way for up to three new townhouses (STCA).
Along with being extremely comfortable with the potential to live in or rent out, the floorplan also provides a main living room with gas heating, a spotless bathroom and a separate kitchen and meals area. Outside, the double carport and sufficient off street parking is appealing, and the addition of a garden shed and a bungalow/studio which is privately placed at the very rear of the block adds more appeal.
The well-established, and what is considered the affluent pocket of the area, this lovely property also prides on being close to the Croydon train station and Main street shops, with McAdam Square shops across Maroondah Hwy and quality schools, including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Good Shepherd Primary School.

Description:
Surprising Space, Luxury & Convenience
Impressive space, luxury and convenience await you in this 4-year young, double storey townhouse. Superb for first homebuyers, couples or investors, this stunning 2 bedroom townhouse is quietly situated at the rear of a boutique block of only 5 townhouses. This prized, no-through road is walking distance to station (about 20 minutes), buses, Arndale shops, Main St shops and cafes, library, Aquahub and Swinburne University (Croydon campus).
Walk to Ruskin Park Primary, Dorset Golf Course, parks and Dorset Recreation Reserve. An internal access remote single garage and entry hallway introduces an elegant, practical design that flows with space, natural light, openness, green outlooks and style factor. Imagine high ceilings, soft tones, a guest powder room, LED downlights, fantastic storage and quality carpets, window furnishings and floor tiles. Ducted heating and 2 split systems ensure your comfort.
Two large double bedrooms (his/hers BIRs) and an upmarket floor-to-ceiling tiled bathroom showcasing deep soak bath and big, semi frameless shower are quietly zoned upstairs. The sizeable master suite features highlight window and space for a sofa. Bedroom one has a split system and retractable screen door opening to the balcony with inspiring leafy outlooks; ideal for weekend brunch. Also upstairs is a small sitting area with heaps of built-in storage and balcony access.
The beautiful kitchen makes cooking a joy with CaesarStone benchtops, s/s appliances (includes dishwasher), glossy white cabinetry, breakfast bar and abundant storage. With a seamless indoor/outdoor integration for entertaining, the big family/meals room has 2 sets of oversized sliders opening to the roofed verandah and surprisingly spacious, private landscaped garden enhanced by a variety of plants and low-maintenance turf.
A Euro laundry, tool shed and retractable external blinds to the master suite and main bathroom make it perfect.
